awards.text: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 2 wins & 4 nominations.

fullplot: Inventor Tim Jenison seeks to understand the painting techniques used by Dutch Master Johannes Vermeer.
plot: Inventor Tim Jenison seeks to understand the painting techniques used by Dutch Master Johannes Vermeer.
title: Tim's Vermeer

tomatoes.consensus: Entertaining and profound in equal measure, Tim's Vermeer uses its seemingly esoteric subject to pose fascinating questions about art and obsession.
